Generate Tasks for a Learner

Source: R/generate_tasks.R

Generates multiple tasks for a given Learner, based on its properties. This function is primarily used for unit tests, but can also assist while writing custom learners.

generate_tasks(learner, N = 20L)

Arguments

learner

(Learner).
N

(integer(1)). Number of rows of generated tasks.

Value

(list()) of Task.

Examples

tasks = generate_tasks(mlr_learners$get("classif.rpart"))
tasks$missings_binary$data()
#>     target character factor integer logical    numeric ordered
